H0.text: Bithynia was an ancient province on which sea. Mediterranean

H1.text: Bithynia was an ancient province on which sea. Aegean

H2.text: Bithynia was an ancient province on which sea. Marmara

H3.text: Bithynia was an ancient province on which sea. Euxine

A4.text: Bithynia is a geographical region of northwestern Asia Minor (in present-day Turkey), adjoining the Sea of Marmara.

A5.text: Bithynia is a geographical region of northwestern Asia Minor (in present-day Turkey), adjoining the Black Sea.

A6.text: The Sea of Marmara is a small inland sea entirely within the borders of Turkey.

A7.text: The Sea of Marmara has a surface salinity of about 22 parts per thousand, which is slightly more than that of the Black Sea, but only about two-thirds that of most oceans.
